attributes.action: Enforce the Death Penalty on Murders and Rapists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should anyone who murders or rapes someone be able to live? Let alone us, the public pay millions for these people to be kept, have a roof over their head and three meals a day for the rest of their life! What if it was your husband or wife or any family member, friend or anyone you know who has been a victim of one of these brutal or cold blooded attacks? Would your opinion be the same? think about it and think about the peole who are now suffering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
